title: Midnight Bloom Kimono Sleeve Wrap Top
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's wrap top with wide kimono sleeves, deep V-neckline, midnight navy base color with subtle floral jacquard texture, self-tie waist belt, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Wrap top with wide kimono sleeves cut in one piece with bodice, deep V-neckline finished with facing, self-fabric waist tie attached at side seams, hip length, lightweight rayon/poly jacquard blend, subtle floral texture, topstitching for durability.
provenance: Inspired by traditional kimono sleeve trend adapted for contemporary commercial womenswear.
design_text:
Midnight Bloom Kimono Sleeve Wrap Top (KS001)
Colors: midnight navy, soft ivory, muted rose
Fabrics: lightweight rayon, polyester jacquard blend
Prints/Patterns: subtle floral jacquard
Garment Type: wrap top
Silhouette: relaxed wrap
Sleeves: kimono sleeve
Neckline: deep V-neck
Length: hip length
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: self-fabric waist tie, topstitching along neckline, clean-finished hem
Techpack: available
